    • Uses of DifferentiableStateActionValue in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa

      Fields in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa declared as DifferentiableStateActionValue 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DifferentiableStateActionValue GradientDescentSarsaLam.vfa
      The object that performs value function approximation
      Methods in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa with parameters of type DifferentiableStateActionValue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void GradientDescentSarsaLam.GDSLInit(SADomain domain, double gamma, DifferentiableStateActionValue vfa, double learningRate, Policy learningPolicy, int maxEpisodeSize, double lambda)
      Initializes SARSA(\lambda) By default the agent will only save the last learning episode and a call to the GradientDescentSarsaLam.planFromState(State) method will cause the valueFunction to use only one episode for planning; this should probably be changed to a much larger value if you plan on using this algorithm as a planning algorithm.
      Constructors in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa with parameters of type DifferentiableStateActionValue 
      Constructor and Description
      GradientDescentQLearning(SADomain domain, double gamma, DifferentiableStateActionValue vfa, double learningRate)
      Initializes.
      GradientDescentQLearning(SADomain domain, double gamma, DifferentiableStateActionValue vfa, LearningRate learningRate)
      Initializes.
      GradientDescentSarsaLam(SADomain domain, double gamma, DifferentiableStateActionValue vfa, double learningRate, double lambda)
      Initializes SARSA(\lambda) with 0.1 epsilon greedy policy and places no limit on the number of steps the agent can take in an episode.
      GradientDescentSarsaLam(SADomain domain, double gamma, DifferentiableStateActionValue vfa, double learningRate, int maxEpisodeSize, double lambda)
      Initializes SARSA(\lambda) with 0.1 epsilon greedy policy.
      GradientDescentSarsaLam(SADomain domain, double gamma, DifferentiableStateActionValue vfa, double learningRate, Policy learningPolicy, int maxEpisodeSize, double lambda)
      Initializes SARSA(\lambda) By default the agent will only save the last learning episode and a call to the GradientDescentSarsaLam.planFromState(State) method will cause the valueFunction to use only one episode for planning; this should probably be changed to a much larger value if you plan on using this algorithm as a planning algorithm.
